title: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 10: An AI-Driven, Quantum-Ready Platform
author: Steven J Vaughan-Nichols
description: RHEL 10 introduces groundbreaking features such as "image mode" for an immutable operating system and pioneering FIPS compliance for post-quantum cryptography.
cntitle: 红帽企业 Linux 10：一个 AI 驱动的、量子就绪的平台
cndescription: RHEL 10 引入了突破性的功能，例如用于不可变操作系统的“镜像模式”以及用于后量子密码学的开创性 FIPS 合规性。
